description:
Question:❓ Who really was behind the 9/11 Terror Attacks? Was it a false Flag to attack countries like Afghanistan, Iraq and maybe now Syria and also Iran? What could be the reasons behind such a possible deception? Does a building totally collapse and falling into dust just cause of some relatively small fires in upper levels? Were there even real planes that flew into the twin towers or was it just a hoax with bombs to manipulate the minds of the masses? And ideas and explanations? 🤔
